import React from'react';import Chart from'../Chart/Chart';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExpensesChart=props=>{const chartDataPoints=[{label:'Jan',value:0},{label:'Feb',value:0},{label:'Mar',value:0},{label:'Apr',value:0},{label:'May',value:0},{label:'Jun',value:0},{label:'Jul',value:0},{label:'Aug',value:0},{label:'Sep',value:0},{label:'Oct',value:0},{label:'Nov',value:0},{label:'Dec',value:0}];for(const expense of props.expenses){const expenseMonth=expense.date.getMonth();// starting at 0 => January => 0
